root.name: Aura: Fate of the Ages
root.description: In Aura: Fate of the Ages, players take the role of Umang the "Keeper Apprentice." Hidden throughout a universe filled with wondrous and mysterious parallel worlds, exist artifacts of untold power. The Clan of Keepers have safeguarded these artifacts for generations, but a sinister evil threatens to unleash this power and rip universe apart! Umang must unravel the mysteries and travel to each of the four worlds to stop this threat before it's too late.
